title: About
text:
I'm not someone who always knew their passion from a young age and chased it relentlessly. Instead, I found my calling in web development later on, after finishing my Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Music Science and exploring various paths.

But the moment I started playing around with HTML, everything clicked and I knew instantly that I had found my lifelong pursuit.

Since then, I've been dedicated to improving my skills and expanding my knowledge daily, striving to grow both as a developer and as an individual.
